Primary Contact: Marie Dubord, Manager, Cancer Connection; Phone: 1.604.675.7106; Email: mdubord@bc.cancer.ca
Service Details: - Connects people diagnosed with cancer and/or their caregivers with a trained volunteer who has had a similar cancer experience- Connections are tailored to individual needs and can be based on diagnosis, treatment type and lifestyle similarities - Volunteers offer emotional support, a listening ear, shared experience, understanding and encouragement.
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and upMust be diagnosed with cancer or caring for someone who has been diagnosed with cancer
How to Apply: - Please call, email or complete the online referral form- Health care providers can also refer a patient
Address & Map: Canadian Cancer Society: BC & Yukon Division565 10th Ave WVancouver, BC     V5Z 4J4View MapQuest Map
Languages: English ; French ; If English or French is not your first language we may be able to find a volunteer to speak with you in your language * CancerConnection is available in all provinces * please call for more information.
